notes.text: Upper-level undergraduate courses representing advanced specialized topics.

items.title: COSC 401/402 - Senior Design
items.subtitle: A design course that focuses the student's attention on professional practice, ethics, accumulated background of curricular components, and recent developments in the field.

items.title: COSC 420 - Biologically-Inspired Computation
items.subtitle: Recent developments in computational methods inspired by nature, including the use of biologically inspired algorithms to solve problems.

items.title: COSC 493 - Advanced Automata Theory
items.subtitle: Development of a Turing Machine simulator as educational aid, with focus on automata theory and theoretical computer science.

items.title: COSC 465 - Databases and Scripting Languages
items.subtitle: In-depth focus on databases and their usage in web applications with introduction to scripting languages.
